Functional Requirement Details:
Ability to book, price, mark-to-the-market, and calculate P/L of IRS in accordance with normal market practice, TMB practice, and related standard and regulation. All functions applied for IRS and CRS must be usable as well as or better than current version.
Ability to book IRS (float/float, fixed/float)

Ability to book, price, mark-to-the-market, and calculate P/L of NDS in accordance with normal market practice, TMB practice, and related standard and regulation. All functions applied for IRS and CRS must be usable as well as or better than current version.
Ability to book NDS (float/float, fixed/float)

Ability to book, price, mark-to-the-market, and calculate P/L of CRS in accordance with normal market practice, TMB practice, and related standard and regulation. All functions applied for IRS and CRS must be usable as well as or better than current version.
Ability to book CCS (fixed/fixed, float/float, fixed/float)
Ability to book Amortized IRS, NDS and CCS
Amortise with grace period to be supported
Ability to book Accreting IRS, NDS and CCS
When change model, Risk simulation should automatically take the new model into account

Ability to handle following market operations:
Cancellation
Cancel and Reissue
Fixing
Early termination
Expiry
Restructure
Exercise

Following simulation view should be available for real time monitoring:
LT Swap MV
LT Swap MV2

Following Reporting should be available:
Swap Hedging for Banking Books
